title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.27 - Terms and conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.27 - Terms and conditions

State Regulations
(a) Grants
for regional and industrial planning studies and economic development
initiatives assistance shall generally not exceed $150,000 and shall require an
equity contribution of 10 percent. (b) The foregoing term and condition is in
addition to the applicable general terms and conditions set forth in section
4243.4
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
